TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataPagerField extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public MustInherit Class DataPagerField Implements IStateManager
public ref class DataPagerField abstract : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 用作数据页导航字段类型的基类，这些类型表示 控件的导航控件。

span.span: Serves as the base class for data pager field types, which represent a navigation control for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用作所有数据页导航字段类型的基类。The class serves as the base class for all data pager field types. 数据页导航字段由来表示导航控件的控件。Data pager fields are used by the control to represent a navigation control. 使用派生自类以选择中显示哪种类型的页导航控件。Use the classes that are derived from to select which type of pager is displayed in the control. 下表列出了可用的数据页导航字段类型。The following table lists available data pager field types. |页导航字段类型Pager field type|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||允许用户一次，或跳转到第一个或最后一个页面中数据页一页导航。Lets users navigate through data pages one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page.| ||允许用户选择页的页码。Lets users select a page by page number.| ||允许页面开发人员创建自定义分页 UI。Lets page developers create a custom paging UI.| 可以从派生类，以创建更多页导航字段类型。You can derive from the class to create additional pager field types. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用， ，并要显示页导航控件中的对象控件。The following example shows how to use , , and objects to display page navigation controls in a control. 对象都派生自类。The objects are derived from the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField/CS/DataPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField/VB/DataPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]

block.para:

When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members:

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为类为抽象类，不能创建直接对象。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create a object directly. 此构造函数通常由派生类中定义的属性初始化的构造函数调用类。This constructor is typically called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties that are defined in the class.

span.span: Creates a copy of the current object that is derived from .
A copy of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是使用一个帮助器方法方法来创建派生自当前对象的副本。The method is a helper method that is used by the method to create a copy of the current object that is derived from . 创建当前对象的副本方法首先创建的新实例通过使用对象方法。To create a copy of the current object, the method first creates a new instance of a object by using the method. 然后，它调用方法复制当前对象的属性值。Then it calls the method to copy the property values of the current object.

span.span: The target page number.

summary.span: 创建一个 URL，该 URL 包含具有指定页码的查询字符串字段。

span.span: Creates a URL that contains a query string field that has the specified page number.
The target URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可供和页导航字段创建页导航字段的每个按钮的目标 URL。The method is used by the and pager fields to create the target URL for each button of the pager field. 目标 URL 包括包含名称/值对的查询字符串字段。The target URL includes a query string field that contains a name/value pair. 该名称为的值属性和值表示的值的`pageNumber`。The name is the value of the property, and the value represents the value of `pageNumber`.

ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadViewState(object savedState) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub LoadViewState (savedState As Object)
abstract member LoadViewState : obj -> unit override this.LoadViewState : obj -> unit

param.name: savedState
param.span: 保存的该控件的视图状态值。

span.span: The saved view-state values for the control.

summary.span: 还原以前保存的视图状态信息。

span.span: Restores view-state information that was saved previously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将还原的视图状态信息对象，它保存的在上一个页请求过程的方法。The method restores view-state information for the object that was saved by the method during a previous page request. 此方法主要供[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is primarily used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnFieldChanged() cil managed
abstract member OnFieldChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnFieldChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发事件，指示的状态对象已更改。The method raises an event that indicates that the state of the object has changed. 将更改为属性会导致引发此事件。Changes to the property cause this event to be raised. 在派生类型中的属性的更改还会引发此事件发生状态更改时。Changes to properties in derived types also raise this event when state changes occur. 方法可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The method enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当您重写派生类中调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property bool QueryStringHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.QueryStringHandled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已对查询字符串字段进行计算。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the query string field has been evaluated.

value.span: 如果已经对查询字符串字段进行计算，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the query string field has been evaluated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并页导航字段使用属性来确定是否已对查询字符串字段进行计算。The and pager fields use the property to determine whether the query string field has been evaluated. 如果是`false`，页导航字段类处理查询字符串字段中包含的页码。If is `false`, the pager field class processes the page number that is contained in the query string field. 它还会更新页属性的控件。It also updates the page properties of the control. 页导航字段类使用此属性时，才属性不是空字符串或`null`。The pager field class uses this property only when the property is not an empty string or `null`.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property QueryStringValue As String
protected: property System::String ^ QueryStringValue { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从请求的 URL 获取查询字符串字段的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the query string field from the URL of the request.
The value of the query string field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性不是空字符串或`null`，则控件使用 HTTP GET 命令来在页之间导航。When the property is not an empty string or `null`, the control uses the HTTP GET command to navigate through the pages. 名称/值对组成的查询字符串字段添加到页面的 URL。A query string field that consists of a name/value pair is added to the URL of the page. 属性从请求的 URL 检索查询字符串字段的值。The property retrieves the value of the query string field from the URL of the request. 属性包含请求的页面编号。The property contains the requested page number. 此属性由和页导航字段来评估请求的数据页的第一个记录的索引。This property is used by the and pager fields to evaluate the index of the first record for the page of data requested. 页属性的然后更新控件。The page properties of the control are then updated.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

summary.span: 保存对 对象的视图状态所做的更改。

span.span: Saves the changes that were made to the object's view state.
The view-state changes for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有与对象关联的视图状态方法将返回`null`。If there is no view state associated with the object, the method returns `null`. 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is primarily used by control developers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 使 对象跟踪其视图状态更改，以便这些更改可以存储在控件的 属性中并在同一页的不同请求间保留。

span.span: Causes the object to track changes to its view state so that they can be stored in the control's property and persisted across requests for the same page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口方法调用方法。The interface method invokes the method. 此文件包含的实际实现且可由控件开发人员扩展。This contains the actual implementation and can be extended by control developers.

abstract member TrackViewState : unit -> unit override this.TrackViewState : unit -> unit

summary.span: 使 对象跟踪其视图状态更改，以便这些更改可以存储在控件的 属性中并在同一页的不同请求间保留。

span.span: Causes the object to track changes to its view state so that they can be stored in the control's property and persisted across requests for the same page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在内部设置属性设置为`true`，并调用方法对象。The method internally sets the property to `true` and invokes the method for the object.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ViewState As StateBag
protected: property System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ ViewState { System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取状态信息的字典，这些信息使您可以在同一页的多个请求间保存和还原 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that enables you to save and restore the view state of a object across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 一个包含 视图状态信息的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据页导航字段的视图状态是所有其属性值的累计。A data pager field's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 若要在同一页的 HTTP 请求之间保留值，ASP.NET 服务器控件使用此属性来存储属性值。To preserve values across HTTP requests for the same page, ASP.NET server controls use this property to store the property values. 值存储在一个 HTML 隐藏 input 元素的页上。The values are stored in an HTML hidden input element on the page. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 视图状态概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818)。For more information, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818). 默认情况下，启用了视图状态的所有服务器控件，但是某些情况下时您可能希望禁用它。By default, view state is enabled for all server controls, but there are circumstances when you might want to disable it. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 性能概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b). 有关字典和如何使用它们的详细信息，请参阅[集合和数据结构](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md)。For more information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md).

span.span: ListView Web Server Control
